name: SynopsysPolaris
description: The Azure Dev Ops plugin for Polaris Software Integrity Platform.
author: Synopsys

inputs.name: polarisService
inputs.label: Polaris Software Integrity Platform Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Synopsys Polaris instance this task will run against.

inputs.name: polarisProxyService
inputs.label: Polaris Software Integrity Platform Proxy Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy this task should use.

inputs.name: polarisCommand
inputs.label: Polaris Software Integrity Platform Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The arguments to pass to the Polaris Software Integrity Platform CLI.

inputs.name: waitForIssues
inputs.label: Check for issues
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, this task wait for the Polaris Software Integrity Platform instance and fail the build if issues are detected.

inputs.name: populateChangeSetFile
inputs.label: Populate SCM changeset in file at $CHANGE_SET_FILE_PATH for incremental analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, a file is created at CHANGE_SET_FILE_PATH with the absolute paths to all changed files. If the environment variable is not present, the file will be created at .synopsys/polaris/changeSetFile.txt and the environment variable will be set. Note that $CHANGE_SET_FILE_PATH will be replaced with the given path in the command.

inputs.name: whenChangeSetEmpty
inputs.label: When static analysis is skipped because the changeset contained no files to analyze
inputs.helpMarkDown: If there are no changed files, the task can be configured to succeed or fail.
